spec_data.Name: subdownloader
spec_data.Description:
SubDownloader is a Free Open Source tool written in Python
for automatic download/upload subtitles for video files
(DIVX,MPEG,AVI,VOB,etc) and DVD's using fast hashing.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 07:02:35 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Program for download/upload subtitles for video files and DVDs
